page.title: 04HALLOW VILLAGE SHOPS
page.content: There are two shops in{Hallow,}a store,and a {Post Office.}They sell groceries,sweets,frozen food, cigarettes and newspapers.Locals use the shops mostly but passing customers stop at the store for hot sandwiches, drinks and cigarettes.Most people buy sweets for children,cigarettes,bread and milk. The{P.O.}sell stamps, newspapers,wines and spirits.The most popular newspaper is the{Sun,Woman's} {Weekly}is the most popular ladies magazine and{Beano,}children's.Both shops open at 7am and close at 6pm but on{Sundays}the hours are shorter.There are about{200 customers}a day.After mothers have taken the children to school they call in for food to make the children's lunches the next day. Children mostly buy sweets.There are 5 staff in the{P.O.}and 1 in the store.Christmas is the busiest time.
